pr_title: Don't attempt to load classes from the java package

timeline.bodyText: I would bet there is a formatting issue with a missing space after the if.
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.message:
Don't attempt to load classes from the java package

If a dependency has packaged java. classes for some reason
this could cause problems.

Fixes #8260
